tool.name: VCF FILTER Add or Replace
tool.description: Replace or add a FILTER annotation to every record in the input VCF.

param.name: annot
param.label: FILTER Annotation
param.help: FILTER annotation to include in VCF entries.

param.name: str_size
param.label: Max Length
param.help: Maximum size of the FILTER annotation to be added.

tool.help: Replace or add a FILTER annotation to every record in the input VCF. FILTER string will be appended if the value is not "PASS" or ".". String should be smaller than the max length specified, and should be made up of alphanumeric characters.
